TAMPA, Fla. (FOX 13) —  Researchers in Florida are tracking a mutation in the COVID-19 virus that makes it better at infecting human cells.

articles.title: Is this the second wave of COVID-19 in the United States? - AOL
articles.description: States began the process of reopening after lockdown when the coronavirus appeared to be finally ebbing - but now cases are rising again.
